I really appreciated you keeping watch while I took a nap on the side of the road when we ran out of gas earlier.
That's a good idea. I don't want to put either of us in a dangerous situation by driving when we're too tired.
It was lucky that we had a spare tire and were able to change it quickly. But I remember feeling so anxious when we were stuck on the side of the road with cars whizzing past us.
Agreed. And let's also try to take more breaks and switch drivers on our future road trips. I don't want to put your safety, or mine, at risk.
Oh man, my stomach hasn't been feeling great today.
What? It's a natural bodily function.
Hey, remember when we ran out of gas on the highway and I took that nap?
That sounds great, thanks. By the way, remember that time I asked you to dance with me?
I can't believe I actually did it. I asked her out.
We haven't set a date yet, but I'm looking forward to it.
